name: Caton's Snack Time!!!
description:
The most cute race on the iOS begins!!!
A heated race by easy operation!!!
The third work of FOREST series is a trap battle of Caton and Kumakku!
They fight with each other again who did also in the 'The Thousand Seasons of Kyumori'!!
Also PanDA is entering, as one of Caton's traps...
Let's support Caton to escape with many traps.
Various kinds of trap effects in various kinds of stages.
Go for it, Caton! Sorry, Kumakku! Pity, PanDA!
